repairedDockerfile:
FROM ruby:2.5.7
RUN apt-get update -qq && apt-get install -y
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y \
        build-essential \
        libpq-dev nodejs \
        libqt4-dev \
        libqtwebkit-dev && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN mkdir /fugacious
WORKDIR /fugacious
ADD . /fugacious
RUN bin/setup
